name: Puzzle Escape (aidanthephoenix, Rynder, Dinowolf10, Ythorin)
description:
Puzzle escape is a top down adventure game with puzzle elements. You heard about a tomb in eastern Latin America and wanted to explore it.

When you entered the cave, the entrance behind you collapsed. There is nowhere else to go, but down. Will you survive?...

External Assets used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/adventurer-blake-1...
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/skeleton-outlaw-130946
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/cube-world-proto-series-14...
